n: Paleo Barbecue Sauce With Some Kick
des: "Paleo style. You can put this on anything from chicken to steak to eggs. Feel free to substitute as needed if you need less kick."
ins: Mix beef stock, tomato paste, shallot, Dijon mustard, garlic, apple cider vinegar, avocado oil, cumin, cayenne pepper, black pepper, horseradish, red pepper flakes, and salt in a saucepan over medium heat. Bring to a simmer, stirring until mixture is well combined. Reduce heat to medium-low, cover, and simmer until slightly thickened, 15 to 20 minutes, stirring frequently.
